alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 2:08PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including Adams, Arapahoe and Denver Counties. * WHEN...Until 515 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 207 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Denver, Aurora, northeastern Centennial, northeastern Commerce City, eastern Englewood, Greenwood Village, western Denver International Airport, Buckley SFB, Watkins, Cherry Hills Village and Cherry Creek Reservoir.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
